versions.name: Initial version
versions.summary:
The short lived successor to the Neo Geo MVS arcade system. It was the first and only SNK system with the ability to render in 3D. 
 
The system was discontinued after 2 years with only 7 games made for it.
versions.cpu: NEC VR4300 (64-bit MIPS III architecture based) @ 100 MHz with 4 MB RAM and 64 MB Program Memory
versions.sound: 32-channel PCM wavetable audio, with maximum sampling frequency of 44.1 kHz (CD-quality) and 32 MB of wavetable RAM
